howToJoin.title: Application
howToJoin.description: Fill out our simple online membership form on the MIDA website.

howToJoin.title: Nominal Fee
howToJoin.description: Pay a nominal membership fee of [insert amount] to gain full access to all society benefits and resources. This fee supports the organization of events, workshops, and access to exclusive content.

howToJoin.title: Confirmation
howToJoin.description: Once your application and payment are processed, you'll receive a confirmation email with your membership details and benefits.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Exclusive Workshops and Webinars
MembershipBenefits:.description: Gain access to specialized workshops, webinars, and training sessions on cutting-edge topics in machine intelligence and data analytics.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Networking Opportunities
MembershipBenefits:.description: Connect with like-minded individuals, industry professionals, and academic experts through events, conferences, and our online community.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Research Collaborations
MembershipBenefits:.description: Engage in collaborative research projects, gain access to research resources, and contribute to innovative solutions in AI and data science.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Career Development
MembershipBenefits:.description: Take advantage of career guidance, mentorship programs, and job placement assistance through our network of industry partners and alumni.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Hands-On Projects
MembershipBenefits:.description: Participate in hands-on projects and competitions that allow you to apply your skills and gain practical experience in real-world scenarios.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Resource Library
MembershipBenefits:.description: Access our growing library of resources, including research papers, tutorials, and tools to enhance your knowledge and expertise.

MembershipBenefits:.title: Discounts on Events
MembershipBenefits:.description: Enjoy discounted rates for MIDA-hosted events, conferences, and certification courses.

WhoCanJoin.title: Students
WhoCanJoin.description: Build your foundation in AI and data analytics while connecting with peers and mentors.

WhoCanJoin.title: Researchers
WhoCanJoin.description: Collaborate with others in the field to push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible in machine intelligence.

WhoCanJoin.title: Professionals
WhoCanJoin.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, and expand your network within the industry.
